revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=BT |model=YouView Mini Box |revision=(DB-T2200) |est_release_date=01/2015 |manuf_country=EU |is_manuf=No |manuf=Humax |manuf_model=DB-T2200 |manuf_rev=1.1 |type=set top box |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM7241 |fla1=4 GiB |fla1_brand=Micron |fla1_model=MTFC4GACAAAM-1M WT |fla2=4 |fla2_brand=Macronix |fla2_model=MX25L3255E |ram1=2 GiB |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B4G0846D |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, HDMI |expansion_usb_num=1 |expansion_hdmi_num=1 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, unpopulated,, JP200,, JP201 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |flags=HDMI out |oui_eth=CC:4E:EC }} {{TagLine|BT Mini YouView Box}} :[https://bt.custhelp.com/app/answers/detail/a_id/51248 Support page]
*The BT Mini YouView Box is a set top box shipped to BT :customers as part of package TV/broadband/phone deals. :It receives Freeview, plus some sports streams from BT, :and allows limited (RAM-buffered) pausing/rewinding.
It appears to be, or share its SoC with, the TiVo Series 5 "Roamio".
Other ICs on the board: * [[Broadcom]] BCM3461 (DVB-T, DVB-T2 and DVB-C) • [https://www.broadcom.com/products/broadband/set-top-box/bcm3461 PPage] : ''DVB-T2 Receiver with Integrated Tuner for Digital Terrestrial TV'' * 2nd flash chip is a 4 GiB ''Micron'' MTFC4GACAAAM-1M WT (eMMC)
===Reviews=== *[http://www.pocket-lint.com/review/132774-youview-from-bt-db-t2200-mini-box-review-ideal-for-your-second-tv ''BT Mini Box DB-T2200 Review'']
===See also=== *[[BT Home Hub]] *[[BT YouView+ Ultra HD Box]] (DTR-T2100) • [http://bt.custhelp.com/app/answers/detail/a_id/53977 PPage] • [http://www.pocket-lint.com/review/128827-bt-youview-humax-dtr-t2100-review Review]
